doc.field:
This table contains information about demand responsive services (Dial-a-Ride) provided for the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), both by Metro Mobility and under contract by County providers.
Dial-a-ride service for the general public is available through the Transit Link Dial-a-Ride program. (see TransitLink.dbf)
ADA service areas are defined by complete cities or townships within a county (some cities are cut along county boundaries). Information is geographically references with the COCTU_CODE field (concatenation of 3-digit FIPS county code and 5-digit FIPS place code (CTU code)).

Dial-a-ride service for the general public is available through the Transit Link Dial-a-Ride program. (see TransitLink.dbf)
ADA service areas are defined by complete cities or townships within a county (some cities are cut along county boundaries). Information is geographically references with the COCTU_CODE field (concatenation of 3-digit FIPS county code and 5-digit FIPS place code (CTU code)).</abstract> <purpose>This table can be joined to the "Counties and Cities & Townships, Twin Cities Metropolitan Area" spatial dataset using the COCTU_CODE field (concatenation of 3-digit FIPS county code and 5-digit FIPS place code). This will allow users to create maps and conduct spatial analyses with the data in this table.</purpose> <supplinf /> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>20110401</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>2011 Metropolitan Council staff review</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>Complete</progress> <update>As needed</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-94.0</westbc> <eastbc>-92.135</eastbc> <northbc>45.414</northbc> <southbc>44.471</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>None</themekt> <themekey>Transportation, Transit Services, Metro Mobility, Senior Transportation, Dial-a-ride, demand response</themekey> </theme> <place> <placekey>Minnesota, Twin Cities</placekey> </place> </keywords> <accconst>None</accconst> <useconst>None</useconst> <ptcontac> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Rachel Wiken</cntper> <cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntpos>GIS Technician</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype> mailing and physical address </addrtype> <address>390 Robert Street North</address> <city>St. Paul</city> <state>Minnesota</state> <postal>55101-1805</postal> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>651.602.1572</cntvoice> <cntfax>651.602.1739</cntfax> <cntemail>rachel.wiken@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail> </cntinfo> </ptcontac> <browse> <browsen>None available</browsen> <browsed /> </browse> <native>dBASE IV (DBF 4)</native> <crossref> <citeinfo> <title>Counties and Cities & Townships, Twin Cities Metropolitan Area ( http://www.datafinder.org/metadata/CountiesAndCTUs.htm )</title> </citeinfo> </crossref> </idinfo> <dataqual> <attracc> <attraccr>Derived from hard copy maps. Attribute accuracy has not been verified.</attraccr> </attracc> <logic /> <complete>7 County Metropolitan Area of the Twin Cities. (Anoka, Carver, Dakota, Hennepin, Ramsey, Scott, and Washington Counties)</complete> <posacc> <horizpa> <horizpar /> </horizpa> <vertacc> <vertaccr /> </vertacc> </posacc> <lineage> <srcinfo> <srcscale /> </srcinfo> <procstep> <procdesc /> </procstep> </lineage> </dataqual> <spdoinfo> <indspref>COCTU_CODE: 8 digit code that is a concatenation of the 3-digit FIPS county code and 5-digit FIPS place code</indspref> <direct /> <mgmg3obj /> <mgmg3til>One file for entire Twin Cities Metropolitan Area</mgmg3til> </spdoinfo>
<eainfo> <overview> <eaover>COCTU_CODE: 8-digit code that uniquely defines every city or township within each county. This is a concatenation of the 3-digit FIPS and MN state standard county code and the 5-digit FIPS 'Place' code (which is also a Census Bureau and MetroGIS standard code for cities, townships and unorganized territories (CTUs)).
COCTU_DESC: City or Township Name
METMO: "YES" if City / Township is within Metro Mobility ADA service area, otherwise blank
COUNTY: If the City / Township has ADA service provided by a County, the name of the provider is listed in this field. "Anoka County Travelor", "DARTS", "HSI", or "Scott County", otherwise blank
OVERLAP: Some cities have ADA service provided by Metro Mobility AND under contract County providers. These cities are listed as "YES" in this field</eaover> <eadetcit /> </overview> </eainfo> <distinfo> <distrib> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Mark Kotz</cntper> <cntorg>Metropolitan Council</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntpos>GIS Database Administrator</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype> mailing and physical address </addrtype> <address>390 Robert Street North</address> <city>St. Paul</city> <state>Minnesota</state> <postal>55101-1805</postal> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>651.602.1644</cntvoice> <cntfax>651.602.1674</cntfax> <cntemail>mark.kotz@metc.state.mn.us</cntemail> </cntinfo> </distrib> <resdesc>ADAServiceProviderAreas</resdesc> <distliab>NOTICE: The Geographic Information System (GIS) Data to which this notice is attached are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13).
